xml:
Calmurid<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Dry, scaling and itching skin

To the skin

  • Child

    Apply twice daily, apply a thick layer for 3–5 minutes, massage into area, and remove excess. Can be diluted with aqueous cream (life of diluted cream is 14 days). Half-strength cream can be used for 1 week if stinging occurs.

  • Adult

    Apply twice daily, apply a thick layer for 3–5 minutes, massage into area, and remove excess. Can be diluted with aqueous cream (life of diluted cream is 14 days). Half-strength cream can be used for 1 week if stinging occurs.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
